[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/BOGOTA-1.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||79px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

bOGOTA, COLOMBIA

4 DAYS/3 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”4px||39px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”30px|0px|33px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Oswald” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 01: BOGOTA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Reception at the airport, transfer to a city hotel.

Accommodation in the selected hotel.

Free afternoon.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width=”81.8%” min_height=”288px” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||” custom_padding=”||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 02: CITY TOUR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Breakfast at the hotel.

After your breakfast we will continue to the city tour of Bogotá. This South American city lies at 2600 meters altitude on a mountain plateau in the eastern mountains of the Andes. We will be visiting the Historic Center, The Nariño Palace, La Candelaria, Cerro Monserrate and the Church of the Divine Child.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 03: SALT CATHEDRAL OF ZIPAQUIRA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Breakfast at the hotel.

Early departure to visit the Salt Cathedral of Zipaquira. The Salt Cathedral is an underground Roman Catholic church built within the tunnels of a salt mine 190 metres underground was carved by removing 250,000 tons of salt in a halite mountain near the city of Zipaquira.

After visiting this amazing human creation, we are going back to the hotel.

            

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 04: DEPARTURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]reakfast at the hotel.

Transfer from the hotel to the airport.

Note: You can add our Medellín or Cartagena programs after Bogota![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ inner_shadow=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”2px|0px|44px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ column_structure=”1_2,1_2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Visas” url=”https://visaguide.world/south-america/colombia-visa/” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%113%%” icon_color=”#000000″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ url_new_window=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Currency calculator” url=”https://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/convert/?Amount=2&From=USD&To=COP” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%163%%” icon_color=”#000000″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ url_new_window=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-114px||-147px|||” custom_padding=”66px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”117″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ min_height=”0px” custom_margin=”-2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”1px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
